sentence: What hardware courses are offered in Spring or Summer 2016 ?
sql: SELECT COURSEalias0.DEPARTMENT , COURSEalias0.NAME , COURSEalias0.NUMBER FROM COURSE AS COURSEalias0 INNER JOIN AREA AS AREAalias0 ON COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID = AREAalias0.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN COURSE_OFFERING AS COURSE_OFFERINGalias0 ON COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID = COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN SEMESTER AS SEMESTERalias0 ON SEMESTERalias0.SEMESTER_ID = COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.SEMESTER WHERE AREAalias0.AREA LIKE "%hardware%" AND SEMESTERalias0.SEMESTER IN ( "SP" , "SU" , "SS" ) AND SEMESTERalias0.YEAR = 2016 ;
